heading: Jesus kã dɛ Moses mbra no ahyɛ mã wɔ no mu—Nephifo nye nguan nkaa no a ɔkãa ho asɛm wɔ Jerusalem no—Osian emumuyɛ ntsi Ewuradze no nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Jerusalem no nnyim Israel nguan a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse no. Christ n’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 34.

verses.txt: Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus dze ne kasaa yi baa ewiei no, ɔdze n’enyiwa kɔr aprɔw wɔ nyimpadodow no do, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Hwɛ hom atse ndzɛmba a mekyerɛkyerɛe ansaana morofow akɔ m’Egya nkyɛn; dɛm ntsi nyia ɔbɛkaa dɛm nsɛm yi na ɔayɛ no, ɔno na mebɛma no do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.

Na ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi wiei no, ohun dɛ binom wɔ hɔn mu a hɔnho nwanwa hɔn na wɔrodwen dza ɔbɛyɛ wɔ Moses mbra no ho; osiandɛ wɔanntse dza ɔkãa dɛ ndzɛmba adadaw etwa mu kɔ, na ndzɛmba nyina abɛyɛ fofor no ase.
Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ: Mma ɔnnyɛ hom nwanwa dɛ mesee hom dɛ ndzɛmba adadaw etwa mu kɔ, na dɛ ndzɛmba nyina abɛyɛ fofor.
Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ mbra a wɔdze maa Moses no ahyɛ mã.
Hwɛ, Emi nye nyia ɔdze mbra no mae, na Emi nye nyia menye mo nkorɔfo Israelmba dzii ahyɛmu; dɛm ntsi, mbra no ahyɛ mã wɔ mo mu, na maba rebɛhyɛ mbra no mã; dɛm ntsi ɔwɔ ewiei.
Hwɛ, merennsɛɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no, na mbom dodowara a ɔnnhyɛɛ mã wɔ mo mu no, nokwar mese hom dɛ, ne nyina bɛhyɛ mã.
Na osiandɛ mesee hom dɛ ndzɛmba adadaw etwa mu kɔ no nnkyerɛ dɛ meresɛɛ dza wɔakã a ɔfa ndzɛmba a ɔrebɛba no ho.
Na hwɛ, ahyɛmu a menye mo nkorɔfo dzii no ne nyina nnhyɛɛ mã; na mbom mbra a wɔdze maa Moses no aba ewiei wɔ mo mu.
Hwɛ, Emi nye mbra no, nye kan no. Hom nhwɛ me, na hom ntsim nkodu ewiei, na hom bɛtsena nkwa mu, na nyia otsim kodu ewiei no mebɛma no onnyiewiei nkwa.
Hwɛ, medze mbrasɛm no ama hom; dɛm ntsi hom ndzi me mbrasɛm do. Na iyi nye mbra no nye nkɔnhyɛfo no, osiandɛ wodzii mo ho dase nokwar mu.
Na afei ɔbaa dɛ ber a Jesus kãa dɛm nsɛm yi no, ɔsee duebien no a ɔsaan mu yii hɔn no dɛ:
Hom yɛ m’esuafo; na hom yɛ kandzea dze ma dɛm nkorɔfo yi, hɔn a wɔyɛ Joseph fifo asefo nkaa.
Na hwɛ, iyi nye hom egyapadze asaase; na Egya no dze ama hom.
Na ber biara nnyi hɔ a Egya no ama me mbrasɛm dɛ menkã nkyerɛ hom enuanom a wɔwɔ Jerusalem no.
Nna ber biara nnyi hɔ a Egya no ama me mbrasɛm dɛ menkã nkyerɛ Israel ebusuakuw nkaa no a Egya no eyi hɔn efi asaase no do no.
Na iyi dze Egya no hyɛ me dɛ menkã nkyerɛ hɔn.
Dɛ nguan binom so wɔ hɔ a mowɔ a wonnyi nguanbuw yi mu; hɔn so ɔwɔ dɛ medze hɔn ba, na wɔbɛtse me ndze; na wɔbɛyɛ nguanbuw kor, nye oguanhwɛfo kor.
Na afei, osian hɔn akɔnkye na hɔn ekyingye ntsi wɔanntse m’asɛm no ase; dɛm ntsi wɔhyɛɛ me dɛ mma mennkã biribiara bio wɔ Egya no ho a ɔfa dɛm adze yi ho no nnkyerɛ hɔn.
Mbom, nokwar, mese hom dɛ Egya no ahyɛ me, na mese hom dɛ wɔtseew hom fii hɔnho osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi; dɛm ntsi osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi na wonnyim hom no.
Na nokwar, mese hom bio dɛ Egya no eyi mbusuakuw bi so efi hɔn mu; na osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi wonnyim hɔn.
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ hom nye hɔn a mekãa dɛ: Nguan binom so wɔ hɔ a mowɔ a wonnyi nguanbuw yi mu no; hɔn so ɔwɔ dɛ medze hɔn ba, na wɔbɛtse me ndze; na wɔbɛyɛ nguanbuw kor nye oguanhwɛfo kor.
Na wɔanntse me ase, na wosusuu dɛ ɔbɛyɛ Amanamamfo no; osiandɛ wɔanntse ase dɛ wɔnam hɔn nsɛmpa kã do bɛsakyer Amanamamfo no.
Na wɔanntse me ase dɛ mekãa dɛ wɔbɛtse me ndze; na wɔanntse me ase dɛ Amanamamfo no nnsɛ dɛ wɔtse me ndze dabiarada—na merennda mo ho edzi so nnkyerɛ hɔn gyedɛ ɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no do.
Mbom hwɛ, hom atse me ndze, na hom ehu me; na hom yɛ mo nguan, na wɔdze hom akã hɔn a Egya no dze ama me no ho.
